title: Bose's best noise-cancelling headphones get an $80 price cut at Amazon
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Get the Bose QuietComfort 35 II on sale for $269
article: If you're looking to score a price cut on Bose's best noise-cancelling headphones, then you're in luck. Right now, Amazon has the Bose QuietComfort 35 II on sale for $269 (was $349.99). That's an $80 discount and the best price we've found for the wireless earphones. Amazon also has the top-rated Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700 on sale for $339 (was $379.99).

The Bose Quiet Comfort 35 II feature world-class noise cancelation technology with three different levels to fit any environment. As the name implies, the lightweight headphones offer a comfortable around-ear fit with pillow-like cushions that provide all-day comfort. The wireless headphones also work with Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant so you can control your music, check the weather and more, completely hands-free. The Bose Quiet Comfort 35 II are some of the best noise-cancelling headphones on the market, and while this isn't the lowest price we've seen, it's the best deal we've found today. We don't know how long Amazon will have the headphones on sale, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.
